name: 文艺期刊
description: 典雅复古，书卷气息，适合人文类内容

h1.base: margin: 40px 0 20px; font-size: 2.2em; letter-spacing: 0.08em; line-height: 1.4; text-align: center;

h2.base: margin: 32px 0 16px; font-size: 1.4em; letter-spacing: 0.05em; line-height: 1.5; border-bottom: 1px solid #d6d3d1; padding-bottom: 8px;

styles.paragraph: line-height: 2; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 24px; font-size: 1em; color: #57534e; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-indent: 2em;

code.block: color: #44403c; background: #fafaf9; border-radius: 4px; border: 1px solid #e7e5e4; margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1.2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.7; white-space: pre-wrap;
code.inline: background: #fafaf9; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 3px; color: #78716c; font-size: 14px; border: 1px solid #e7e5e4;

styles.quote: border-left: 3px solid #78716c; padding: 20px 24px; background: #fafaf9; margin: 1.5em 2em; color: #57534e; font-style: italic; word-wrap: break-word; position: relative;
styles.image: max-width: 90%; height: auto; margin: 2em auto; display: block; border-radius: 2px; box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
styles.link: color: #78716c; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px dashed #a8a29e; transition: all 0.2s ease;

table.header: background: #fafaf9; font-weight: 600; color: #44403c; border-bottom: 2px solid #78716c; font-size: 1em; padding: 12px;

styles.hr: border: none; height: 0; border-top: 1px solid #d6d3d1; margin: 40px auto; width: 60%;

footnote.ref: color: #78716c; text-decoration: none; font-size: 0.85em; vertical-align: super;
